alert.note: Alert for Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 7:14PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Las Animas County through 800 PM MDT... At 713 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles northwest of Kim to 14 miles north of Trinchera. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kim. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Las Animas County; Trinidad Vicinity, Western Las Animas County Below 7500 Ft
